# RAWG Flutter App

![RAWGProfileBuild](https://github.com/TJMusiitwa/RAWG_Flutter_App/workflows/RAWGProfileBuild/badge.svg)    [![Codemagic build status](https://api.codemagic.io/apps/5f8b686e8927e996dde14e95/5f8b686e8927e996dde14e94/status_badge.svg)](https://codemagic.io/apps/5f8b686e8927e996dde14e95/5f8b686e8927e996dde14e94/latest_build)

![RAWG Logo](data:image/png;base64,)
  

A cross-platform (Android & iOS) that accesses RAWG API to display information in the application.

To-Do List

 - [ ] Sort the issue with images being returned from API as null
 - [ ] Do API result caching
 - [ ] Work on Pagination of results
 - [ ] Improve the UI where possible
 - [ ] Add Theming
